RelatedSentence: Civil rights historian John A. Kirk and Jess Porter , a geography professor at the University of Arkansas at Little Rock , host the Monday event .
Kirk and Porter are to discuss how Little Rock 's neighborhoods became racially segregated prior to the 1957 Central High desegregation crisis and explore other influences on where people live .
Kirk and Porter are to discuss how Little Rock 's neighborhoods became racially segregated prior to the 1957 Central High desegregation crisis and explore other influences on where people live .
They are to explain how slum clearance , urban renewal , and other policies have enabled racial separation to continue .
